mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Susan Hudson to Lily Laughton, 16 July 1879
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hudson, Susan Edwards Johnson, 1825-1913
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Susan Hudson, Vice Regent for Connecticut, to Lily Macalester Laughton, Regent, July 16, 1879. Regarding rumors circulating about their steamboat captain, Major Blake, which she has tried to stop. Discusses work done around Mount Vernon and the furnishing of state rooms.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Papers of Lily Macalester Berghmans Laughton
